title: brAIn: Analysis of biological images using AI to understand brain function and dysfunction
description: Predoctoral proyect funded by Momentum (CSIC). It's main objective is to understand microglia and blood vessel interaction at 3D level during brain disease

title: PARADYS: MultiPARAmetric Bronchopulmonary DYSplasia Prediction
description: Proteomic analysis of non-invasive samples of very preterm neonates for pulmonary pathologies prediction
